member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jpeg.JpegFileGdiExtensions.SaveWithLosslessRotation(Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.ImageFiles.Jpeg.JpegFile,Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageProcessing.Transforms.ImageRotateFlipType,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Rotates JPEG image without quality loss and saves rotated JPEG image into specified stream. Method can rotate an image if image width and height are multiples of 16.
member.param: The direction of rotation or flip. Supported values: RotateNoneFlipNone, Rotate90FlipNone, Rotate180FlipNone, Rotate270FlipNone, RotateNoneFlipX, RotateNoneFlipY and equivalents.
Stream to save the image file.
member.exception: Thrown if image width or height are not multiples of 16 OR rotateFlip specifies unsupported direction of rotation/flip OR system JPEG encoder is not found.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Drawing.Gdi.GdiGraphicsPath.StartFigure
member.summary: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.
member.remarks: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Drawing.Gdi.GdiGraphicsPath.CloseFigure
member.summary: Closes the current figure and starts a new figure.
member.remarks: If the current figure contains a sequence of connected lines and curves, the method closes the loop by connecting a line from the endpoint to the starting point.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Drawing.Gdi.GdiGraphicsPath.CloseAllFigures
member.summary: Closes all open figures in this path and starts a new figure.
member.remarks: Closes each open figure by connecting a line from its endpoint to its starting point.

A that represents the first control point for the curve.
A that represents the second control point for the curve.
A that represents the endpoint of the curve.

member.summary: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bezier curves to the current figure.
member.param: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curves.

True - the property returns resolution loaded from image file;
false - the property returns the default (screen) resolution.

member.value:
True - the property returns resolution loaded from image file;

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument
member.summary: Sends output images to a printer.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.UseVectorRendering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether vector rendering must be used for printing of PDF and DOCX pages.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.UseImageAutoOrienation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the print document must select the image orientation automatically by aspect ratio of image and printable area (only in BestFit mode).
member.remarks: This property affects only in .BestFit mode.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.PrintScaleMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how to scale image.
member.value: Default value is .None.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.MosaicColumnCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of images displayed horizontally across the page.
member.value: Default value is 1.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.MosaicRowCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of images displayed vertically down the page.
member.value: Default value is 1.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.DistanceBetweenImages
member.summary: Gets or sets space between images, in hundredths of an inch.
member.value: Default value is 5.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.Center
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image is centered on page.
member.value: Default value is false.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.PrintedPageCount
member.summary: Gets counter of printed pages.
member.value: Default value: 0.
member.remarks: Printed image will be divided to some pages in the .None mode if size of the printed image is bigger than size of printer's page and this property allows to get counter of pages for the image.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.AntiAliasing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the antialiased rendering is enabled.
member.value: Default value is true.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.OnBeginPrint(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It is called after the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.OnPrintPage(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event. It is called before a page prints.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.BeginPrintImage(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage,Vintasoft.Imaging.Codecs.Decoders.RenderingSettings)
member.summary: Begins the image printing and allows to initialize the printing settings.

member.summary: Draws the specified rectangular area of on the specified rectangular area of page's .
member.param: Page's graphics, where image should be drawn.
The rectangular area, in device-independent pixels (1/96th inch), of image to draw.
The rectangular area, in pixels, of page's graphics, where image should be drawn.
The resolution of printer along X-axis.
The resolution of printer along Y-axis.
A value indicating whether print document must draw image in landscape mode.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.NeedsUseLandcapeImageOrientation(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage,Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageSize)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified image must be printed in landscape mode.
member.returns: True - specified image must be printed in landscape mode; false - specified image must be printed in normal mode.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.NeedsVectorPrinting(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified image must be printed in vector mode.
member.returns:
True - image can be printed in vector mode;
false - image must be renrasterized before printing.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Print.ImagePrintDocument.EndPrintImage(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage)
member.summary: Ends the image printing and allows to release resources, which was used during printing.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollectionGdiExtensions
member.summary: Provides GDI extensions for class.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollectionGdiExtensions.Insert(Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Image,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Inserts an element(s) into the at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index at which the new elements should be inserted.
The object to be added to the collection.
A value indicating whether image must be disposed when this collection is disposed.
member.exception: Thrown if index is less than zero.
member.remarks:
One object will be added to this collection if image is not a multipage image.
Multiple objects will be added to this collection if image is a multipage GIF/TIFF image.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollectionGdiExtensions.Add(Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection,System.Drawing.Image,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds element(s) to the end of the .
member.param: The to be added to the collection.
A value indicating whether image must be disposed when this collection is disposed.
member.remarks:
One object will be added to this collection if image is not a multipage image.
Multiple objects will be added to this collection if image is a multipage GIF/TIFF image.
